text:

How exactly would they deal with pandemic-related hoarding and price-gouging?

name: politico
text: The White House this past week was facing a familiar series of questions as it grappled with reports of a Russian bounty program targeting American troops in Afghanistan: What did the president know and when did he know it? https://t.co/HrkKXFjvrU
